qas.question: What are some of the findings that support their argument?
What is the name of the 1991 book by Paul Davies and John Gribbins?
Who believes materialism has been proven by scientific findings?
Who believes that physics defined materialism?
Who wrote the chapter "The Birth of Materialism"?

context: Some modern day physicists and science writers—such as <b4_0><b5_0>Paul Davies and John Gribbin<b5_0/><b4_0/>—have argued that materialism has been disproven by certain scientific findings in physics, such as <a0_0>quantum mechanics and chaos theory.<a0_0/> In <b2_0><b3_0>1991<b3_0/><b2_0/>, <b6_0>Gribbin and Davies<b6_0/> released their book <a1_0>The Matter Myth<a1_0/>, the first chapter of which, "The Death of Materialism", contained the following passage:
